article.title: Creative Lives interview
article.author: Daniel Demmel
article.excerpt: I was interviewed by Creative Lives in Progress magazine while working at ustwo to show people how it is to work in the creative industry.

authors.bio: Design technologist / web dev @berylbikes, ex @ustwo, ♥ open source, degrowth & spiritual ecology activist, minimalist, vegetarian, @zzuuu's husband, dad, aspie
authors.name: Daniel Demmel
